
---
title: '每天仅需 3 秒钟：京东现金红包速领（必中 1 次）'

 - IT 之家

thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/4/f3949bc2-fd84-4024-8242-4710a60cd1d8.png'
---

<div>   
<p>即日起～4 月 30 日，每天可抽 3 次京东红包，其中必中 1 次现金红包：<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8AAN4DIgZlGmsUMlZYDUUEJVtXQhRZUAscU0QLTg9SHUlSSkkFSRxOVwhGRUVQV18ST0UXa0lOJ1NTXGdvd1BQU3FDdU4hGxBoVFRXKhMQC1pNUgFSRExHTlplSz92HGZgUWw-fWAIXBdiMhwCCAACa1cZMhAGVR5SFQMaDmUYWRIAFANQGFwlYXUOZRtaJUl8BmUbWBIGEAJdGlMdMhIAVRNaEwoRD1MbWxwyEg9SKwdXUFNFZStrFjIiN1QrWCVcfAYGGFIcCxADO0EEV14TUldbNRABEAZQHF4lABMGVxk" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8AAOADIgZlGmsUMlZYDUUEJVtXQhRZUAscU0QLTg9SHU4YDk5ER1xOGQlLBkgcQlUQQxxBHBBuDlIpXQpbYihrXl4KdkYyUi8VSW9RE0skHUkMXwpOD1wdS0IJRmteQU5bEF0_VmBwTwJcMHdxREBWfBBlDh43UBpTHQcVB1IYaxYAFQVTH14WBSJkMhJrFQciTDsaaxUBFQNXGl4TBBY3VRxbHQMUD1YTXRcHEzdVE1wlXlBVFFlrJTIRN2UrWiUBIlk7GggVAhsHVkk1T11QW1ROU1BsFwddHFkVAiIFVBpZFw" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=/pages/union/proxy/proxy?spreadUrl=https%3a%2f%2funion-click.jd.com%2fjdc%3fe%3d%26p%&EA_PTAG=17078.27.380">点此领取</a>（仅限 App 端）。</p><p><a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/4/f3949bc2-fd84-4024-8242-4710a60cd1d8.png" id="1619079640223-2" title="每天仅需 3 秒钟：京东现金红包速领（必中 1 次）" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></a></p><p>京东红包：可与所有优惠叠加使用，红包自身也可以叠加使用，下单直接抵现。</p><p>红包到次日 23:59:59 失效，<span class="accentTextColor">支持叠加两天的红包一起使用</span>。</p><p>一乖刚刚抽到了 0.8 元红包：</p><p><a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank"></a></p><p><a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/4/03ded38a-9491-4b59-abcc-b60335416ebe.png" id="1619082038528-1" title="每天仅需 3 秒钟：京东现金红包速领（必中 1 次）" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></a></p><p>领取到的红包、优惠券可在活动内“查看奖品 - 我的奖品”查看（另可在京东 APP - 我的 - 我的钱包 - 红包 - 查看红包详细信息，或在京东 APP - 我的 - 我的钱包 - 优惠券 - 查看优惠券详细信息）。</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>京东天天领红包：<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8AAN4DIgZlGmsUMlZYDUUEJVtXQhRZUAscU0QLTg9SHUlSSkkFSRxOVwhGRUVQV18ST0UXa0lOJ1NTXGdvd1BQU3FDdU4hGxBoVFRXKhMQC1pNUgFSRExHTlplSz92HGZgUWw-fWAIXBdiMhwCCAACa1cZMhAGVR5SFQMaDmUYWRIAFANQGFwlYXUOZRtaJUl8BmUbWBIGEAJdGlMdMhIAVRNaEwoRD1MbWxwyEg9SKwdXUFNFZStrFjIiN1QrWCVcfAYGGFIcCxADO0EEV14TUldbNRABEAZQHF4lABMGVxk" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8AAOADIgZlGmsUMlZYDUUEJVtXQhRZUAscU0QLTg9SHU4YDk5ER1xOGQlLBkgcQlUQQxxBHBBuDlIpXQpbYihrXl4KdkYyUi8VSW9RE0skHUkMXwpOD1wdS0IJRmteQU5bEF0_VmBwTwJcMHdxREBWfBBlDh43UBpTHQcVB1IYaxYAFQVTH14WBSJkMhJrFQciTDsaaxUBFQNXGl4TBBY3VRxbHQMUD1YTXRcHEzdVE1wlXlBVFFlrJTIRN2UrWiUBIlk7GggVAhsHVkk1T11QW1ROU1BsFwddHFkVAiIFVBpZFw" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=/pages/union/proxy/proxy?spreadUrl=https%3a%2f%2funion-click.jd.com%2fjdc%3fe%3d%26p%&EA_PTAG=17078.27.380">点此领取</a>（仅限 App 端）。</p></li></ul><p class="tagging2">本文用于传递优惠信息，节省甄选时间，结果仅供参考。</p><div class="tagging1">【广告】</div>
